These embodiments of demented violence and spite are spawned from eddies of angry and warped souls amid Abaddon’s mists. Cacodaemons constantly hunger for mortal souls and yearn to create suffering. As gnashing spheres of teeth, fins, and spines, they are the weakest of daemonkind, an amalgam of various petty forms of death without the strength that comes from focusing on a single cause of demise. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 15 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10 [Cacodaemon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=88) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 70 **Perception** +6; darkvision **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31); telepathy 100 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +5, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8 **Str** +0 **Dex** +3 **Con** +2 **Int** -1 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +2 --- **AC** 16 **Fort** +7 **Ref** +8 **Will** +6 **HP** 22 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects **Weaknesses** good 3 --- **Speed** 5 feet, fly 40 feet **Melee** jaws +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 1d8 piercing plus 1d4 evil and cacodaemonia **Divine Innate Spells** DC 17 - **Cantrips (1st)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) - **1st** [Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (at will; good only), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) - **2nd** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only) - **4th** [Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247) **Cacodaemonia** ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) The cacodaemon can telepathically communicate with the afflicted creature at any distance on the same plane; **Saving Throw** DC 17 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier (1 day); **Stage 2** [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 day); **Stage 3** stupefied 2 (1 day) **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157))
  • **Lizard** Speed 20 feet; **Melee** jaws +8 ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d8+1 piercing
  • **Octopus** size Small; Speed 20 feet, swim 30 feet; **Melee** tentacle +8 ([finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d8+1 bludgeoning plus Grab; **Melee** beak +8 ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d6 piercing plus 2 poison
  • **Scorpion** size Small; Speed 30 feet; **Melee** pincer +8 ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d6+1 bludgeoning plus Grab; **Melee** stinger +8 ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d6+1 piercing plus 1d4 poison
**Soul Lock** ([Death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Once per day, a cacodaemon can ingest the soul of a sentient creature within 30 feet that died within the last minute. When it does, the cacodaemon grows a fist-sized soul gem (Hardness 2, HP 8) in its gut and can regurgitate it at any time as an Interact action. Destroying the gem frees the soul within but does not return the deceased creature to life. The caster of a spell to return a creature to life whose soul is trapped within a soul gem must succeed at a DC 30 Religion check. On a success, the soul gem shatters and the creature is returned to life as normal for the spell.
By using an Interact action, a fiend can ingest a soul gem it is holding, condemning the soul to the fiend’s home plane. The fiend gains fast healing 5 for 1 minute.
name: Cacodaemon
